GlobalVariables.StudyDescription: This file contains the metadata, events, and data for REDCap project "LISTS (Longitudinal Implementation Strategy Tracker System)".

Question.TranslatedText: 4. Was this strategy (or the change to the strategy) prospective? Decode.TranslatedText: Increase <u>acceptability</u> of the EBP (the implementers' or patients' satisfaction with various aspects of the EBP (e.g. content, complexity, comfort, delivery, and credibility))
Decode.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText: Increase <u>acceptability</u> of the EBP (the implementers' or patients' satisfaction with various aspects of the EBP (e.g. content, complexity, comfort, delivery, and credibility))

Decode.TranslatedText: Increase <u>adoption</u> of the EBP or one of its components (number of intervention agents who are willing to initiate the EBP)
Decode.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText: Increase <u>adoption</u> of the EBP or one of its components (number of intervention agents who are willing to initiate the EBP)

Decode.TranslatedText: Increase <u>appropriateness</u> of the EBP for this service context (the perceived fit, relevance, or compatibility of the EBP for a given practice setting, provider, or consumer. NOTE: an EBP can be acceptable but inappropriate and vice versa)
Decode.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText: Increase <u>appropriateness</u> of the EBP for this service context (the perceived fit, relevance, or compatibility of the EBP for a given practice setting, provider, or consumer. NOTE: an EBP can be acceptable but inappropriate and vice versa)

Decode.TranslatedText: Address <u>cost</u>-related to the delivery of the EBP (cost to the organization in time, space, personnel, and materials)
Decode.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText: Address <u>cost</u>-related to the delivery of the EBP (cost to the organization in time, space, personnel, and materials)

Decode.TranslatedText: Increase the <u>feasibility</u> of implementing the EBP (the actual fit, utility, practicability, and suitability for everyday use)
Decode.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText: Increase the <u>feasibility</u> of implementing the EBP (the actual fit, utility, practicability, and suitability for everyday use)

Decode.TranslatedText: Improve <u>fidelity</u> to the EBP (adherence, quality, consistency of delivery as intended)
Decode.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText: Improve <u>fidelity</u> to the EBP (adherence, quality, consistency of delivery as intended)

Decode.TranslatedText: Increase the <u>reach</u> of the EBP (The absolute number, proportion, and representativeness of individuals who are willing to participate in a given initiative)
Decode.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText: Increase the <u>reach</u> of the EBP (The absolute number, proportion, and representativeness of individuals who are willing to participate in a given initiative)

Decode.TranslatedText: Increase <u>sustainability</u> of the EBP (extent to which the EBP becomes institutionalized or part of the routine organizational practices and policies)
Decode.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText: Increase <u>sustainability</u> of the EBP (extent to which the EBP becomes institutionalized or part of the routine organizational practices and policies)

CodeList.Name: st_sectarget___1
